news.topicMessage:
New Features:
  • 1930777- Accept .g as the grammar file extension
  • 1929683- Support ANTLR 3.1

Bugs Fixed:
  • 1931480- NullPointer Exception due to generics
  • 1896086- Missing Grammar name validation
Changes:
  • File extension *.g3 is no longer supported

news.topic: ANTLRv3 IDE now is licensed under EPL

news.topicMessage: First release available for download. Enjoy it
